name: canvas
title: Canvas
description: Effortlessly connect with Canvas LMS to access courses, assignments, grades, and more directly from Raycast.
author: jakmaz

preferences.name: canvasUrl
preferences.title: Canvas URL
preferences.description: The URL of your Canvas LMS instance (e.g., https://yourinstitution.instructure.com)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
